responsibilities: Lead the management of Storage System Software Solutions across the portfolio.
Collaborate with product teams and engineers to develop and implement innovative strategies.
Develop innovative ideas for Dell’s storage portfolio by staying updated on advancements in AI infrastructure, workload orchestration, MLOps platforms, and GenAI applications.
Architect detailed product designs, specifying functionality, performance, integrations, and hardware requirements.
Lead prototyping and testing to validate design and functionality, focusing on performance and scalability.
Refine designs based on feedback, testing, and evolving requirements.
Work with cross-functional teams, partners, and customers to create POCs and MVPs.
Ensure seamless integration of components and technologies.
Mentor and uplift junior team members or peers.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on managing storage system software solutions, collaborating with product teams, developing innovative ideas, and leading prototyping and testing. There is no mention of training or fine-tuning large language models, which is a specialized task related to AI and machine learning. The responsibilities do not indicate involvement in domain-specific tasks or resource management related to language models.
